attributes.action: stop the pay as you go road tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This is to petition the pay as you go road tax which the prime minister is trying to put in place and will end up costing us alot more.
For people who are in low paid jobs and struggle to keep their car on the road, this could mean that they would no longer be able to afford to drive.

rejection.details: there are lots of petitions around this subject already
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
